title: Inside Wadhwani AI: Building artificial intelligence for India's public systems - CNBC TV18
description: Wadhwani AI designs for both constraint and capability. Solutions run on basic smartphones, function offline or with low connectivity, and support multiple Indian languages via multimodal inputs. Scaled adoption is ensured through policy alignment, updated guidelines, and sustained training embedded in existing workflows, with continuous stakeholder feedback for real-time refinement. Scale is engineered via field-first design, systems integration, and long-term public ownership, merging top-down intent with bottom-up execution.
content:
India's public systems operate at a massive scale, which includes multiple languages, varied infrastructure, and diverse local realities. Data is often contextualised for local needs, and connectivity is a “work in progress.”
Frontline workers in hea... [3651 chars]

title: DeepSeek's AI gains traction in developing nations, Microsoft report says
description: DeepSeek, China's leading artificial intelligence start-up, is popular in countries such as Belarus, Russia, Syria, Iran and Ethiopia, according to a new Microsoft study.
content:
Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) Deepseek has been gaining ground in many developing nations, surpassing US models that are popular in the West, according to a new report from Microsoft.

title: KunlunMeta Partners with AMD to Shine at CES
description: Las Vegas, Jan. 09, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- On January 6, 2026 (local time), the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) kicked off grandly in Las Vegas, with Artificial Intelligence (AI) taking center stage as the core highlight of the exhibition. Hunan KunlunMeta Artificial Intelligence Application Software Co., Ltd. (KunlunMeta), a Chinese startup specializing in AI, made its debut at this global tech gala. Lauded as the 'Oriental Meta' for its full-stack General Artificial Intelligence (AGI) technology matrix, the company emerged as the most watched Chinese AI innovator at the event.

title: Reliance Jio considering 2.5% public offering in 2026 IPO: Report
description: Over the past six years, Jio has diversified into artificial intelligence and raised funds from well-known investors including KKR, General Atlantic, Silver Lake and the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority.
content:
Reliance Jio Platforms is considering an initial public offering this year that would float 2.5% of the company, a move that could make it the country's largest-ever IPO worth more than $4 billion.

title: Google adds new AI features to Gmail, turning it into a personal assistant
description: More artificial intelligence is being implanted into Gmail as Google tries to turn the world's most popular email service into a personal assistant that can improve writing, summarize far-flung information buried in inboxes and deliver daily to-do lists.

title: Pioneering Impact: Jupinder Singh Arora's Leadership at Markup Designs
description: Jupinder Singh Arora, CEO of Markup Designs, received the Pioneer Leadership Excellence Award at the ET Awards 2025 for his contributions to IT solutions. Celebrating a decade of innovation, the company has expanded globally with a focus on digital transformation, now venturing into Artificial Intelligence with the launch of MARK AI.

title: Trump Vs Elon Musk on AI: Too Many Jobs-or No Jobs at All?
description: President Trump downplayed fears of mass unemployment due to artificial intelligence, asserting that AI will generate more jobs than can be filled by humans, potentially requiring robots to fill gaps., Economy, Times Now
content:
US President Donald Trump has brushed aside fears that artificial intelligence will trigger mass unemployment, arguing instead that AI will create so many jobs that there may not be enough humans to fill them — forcing robots to step in.

title: Taiwan 2025 exports hit record on strong AI demand
description:
Taiwan's exports closed the year with a record annual total of $640.75 billion, as the island rides a wave of high demand for its chips and technology related to artificial intelligence .

content:
